english.segment1: Come as you are. Open hands, broken heart. As you are. Come with your joy. And your pain. With your doubt and your shame. As you are
english.segment2: Prodigal daughters and sons, everyone. All will be forgiven. No matter what youve done. And when the Father sees you he will run. No matter how far. Come as you are
english.segment3: Come, please dont wait. Theres still time. Its not too late. To come as you are
